Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle") FireSound = Handle:WaitForChild("Fire") ProjectileScript = Tool:WaitForChild("ProjectileScript") OutfitScript = Tool:WaitForChild("OutfitScript")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Velocity = 50
local Pellet = Instance.new("Part") Pellet.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom Pellet.Size = Vector3.new(0.5, 3, 0.5) Pellet.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright orange") Pellet.Material = Enum.Material.SmoothPlastic Pellet.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Pellet.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Pellet.Locked = true Pellet.Name = "Pellet" local Mesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") Mesh.Parent = Pellet
local LooperSound = Instance.new("Sound") LooperSound.Name = "RaySound" LooperSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=28912822" LooperSound.Looped = true LooperSound.Parent = Pellet
ProjectileScript:Clone().Parent = Pellet OutfitScript:Clone().Parent = Pellet
function Fire(v, ShootDirect)
FireSound:Play()
local Launch = Handle.Position + 5 * v
local Missile = Pellet:clone() Missile.CFrame = CFrame.new(Launch, ShootDirect) * CFrame.Angles((math.pi / 2),0,0) Missile.Position = Launch Missile.Velocity = v * 200
local creator = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator.Name = "creator" creator.Value = Player creator.Parent = Missile
local Force = Instance.new("BodyForce") Force.force = Vector3.new(0, (Pellet:GetMass() * 9.81 * 20), 0) Force.Parent = Missile
Missile.ProjectileScript.Disabled = false Missile.RaySound:Play()
Debris:AddItem(Missile, 5) Missile.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace")
end
function onEquipped() FireSound:Stop() end
function onUnequipped() FireSound:Stop() end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
function OnActivated() Character = Tool.Parent Humanoid = Character:WaitForChild("Humanoid") Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) if not Character or not Humanoid or not Player or not Tool.Enabled then return end
local TargetPos = Humanoid.TargetPoint local LookAt = (TargetPos - Handle.Position).unit
Fire(LookAt, TargetPos)
Tool.Enabled = false
wait(0.6)
Tool.Enabled = true
end
Tool.Activated:connect(OnActivated)

--Made by Luckymaxer
arrow = script.Parent creator = arrow:WaitForChild("creator")
debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local HitSound = Instance.new("Sound") HitSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=28913460" HitSound.Parent = arrow HitSound.Volume = 1
function onTouched(hit)
arrow.RaySound.Looped = false arrow.RaySound:Stop() if hit.Parent ~= nil and hit.Parent ~= creator.Value.Character then if hit.Parent:IsA("Hat") then return end HitSound:Play() humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid ~= nil then if not hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("OutfitScript") then local transmorpher = arrow.OutfitScript:clone() transmorpher.Parent = humanoid.Parent transmorpher.Disabled = false end else local e = Instance.new("Explosion") e.BlastPressure = 0 e.BlastRadius = 2 e.Position = arrow.Position e.Parent = game.Workspace end arrow:Destroy() end
end
connection = arrow.Touched:connect(onTouched)

--Made by Luckymaxer --Update for R15 avatar by StarWars
Character = script.Parent Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") or Character:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso") Duration = 30
Meshes = { {MeshId = 125732887, TextureId = 125728597, Scale = Vector3.new(5, 5, 5), Angle = CFrame.Angles(0, 0, 0)}, {MeshId = 18417911, TextureId = 18417918, Scale = Vector3.new(3, 3, 3), Angle = CFrame.Angles((math.pi / 2), 0, 0)}, {MeshId = 40312463, TextureId = 40311968, Scale = Vector3.new(7.5, 7.5, 7.5), Angle = CFrame.Angles(-(math.pi / 2), 0, 0)}, {MeshId = 40312463, TextureId = 40311869, Scale = Vector3.new(7.5, 7.5, 7.5), Angle = CFrame.Angles(-(math.pi / 2), 0, 0)}, {MeshId = 143518445, TextureId = 143499030, Scale = Vector3.new(5, 5, 5), Angle = CFrame.Angles(0, 0, 0)}, {MeshId = 65950268, TextureId = 65950352, Scale = Vector3.new(7.5, 7.5, 7.5), Angle = CFrame.Angles(-(math.pi / 2), 0, 0)}, {MeshId = 18453224, TextureId = 18453205, Scale = Vector3.new(3, 3, 3), Angle = CFrame.Angles((math.pi / 2), 0, 0)} }
BaseUrl = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id="
Objects = {} function SetTransparency(Parent, Transparency, SaveTransparency) for i, v in pairs(Parent:GetChildren()) do SetTransparency(v, Transparency, SaveTransparency) if v:IsA("BasePart") or v:IsA("FaceInstance") then if SaveTransparency then table.insert(Objects, {v, v.Transparency}) end v.Transparency = Transparency end end end
SetTransparency(Character, 1, true)
local RandomMesh = Meshes[math.random(1, #Meshes)]
MeshPart = Instance.new("Part") MeshPart.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom MeshPart.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2) MeshPart.CanCollide = false MeshPart.Name = "MeshPart" MeshPart.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth MeshPart.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth
Mesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") Mesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh Mesh.MeshId = BaseUrl .. tostring(RandomMesh.MeshId) Mesh.TextureId = BaseUrl .. tostring(RandomMesh.TextureId) Mesh.Scale = RandomMesh.Scale Mesh.Parent = MeshPart
MeshPart.Parent = Character
Weld = Instance.new("Weld") Weld.Part0 = Torso Weld.Part1 = MeshPart Weld.C0 = Weld.C0 * RandomMesh.Angle + Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) Weld.Parent = MeshPart
wait(Duration)
MeshPart:Destroy()
for i, v in pairs(Objects) do if v and v[1] and v[1].Parent then v[1].Transparency = v[2] end end
script:Destroy()
